sentences.sContent: The value of other shares nosedived by $2.6 billion.
sentences.sCn: 其他股票市值暴跌了26亿美元。

synos.tran: （价格等的）急降，暴跌；（飞机的）俯冲；（名声）低落；（情况）突然变坏

remMethod.val: nose(鼻； 飞机等的前端) + dive(俯冲， 突降) → (飞机的)俯冲

trans.tranOther: if a plane nosedives, it drops suddenly and steeply with its front end pointing towards the ground

trans.tranCn: （价格等的）急降，暴跌；（飞机的）俯冲；（名声）低落；（情况）突然变坏
trans.tranOther: a sudden very large fall in the price, value, or condition of something
